messages.title: CAMPAIGN EXPERIENCE
messages.content:
Saving our trees: Nick has stood up against the council’s disastrous street tree felling program. He has raised it in Parliament and campaigned alongside Sheffield’s Liberal Democrat councillors to save our healthy trees. 
Safeguarding the local economy: Nick has championed the Advanced Manufacturing Research Centre (AMRC). The AMRC will equip young people with the skills they need to succeed in the high-tech manufacturing industry. 
Campaigning against over development: Alongside the local Lib Dem team, Nick has campaigned against overdevelopment on Sheffield Hallam’s beloved green spaces. He personally committed the Sheffield Liberal Democrats to campaign for the council’s ‘Keep Sheffield Green’ strategy. 
Protecting our pubs: Nick worked with a local campaign group to save The Plough pub in Sandygate. Sainsbury’s wanted to turn The Plough into a store but the community campaign was successful in saving the pub.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working to make sure Sheffield’s NHS gets the support it needs. Campaigning to increase the funding for Sheffield’s schools. Making sure you have a strong and experienced voice speaking up for you.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Sheffield Hallam
politicalExperience.achievements: I’ve represented Sheffield Hallam in Parliament since 2005, and during that time I have helped thousands of local people with issues and problems. I’m proud of the work I have done locally to make a difference to peoples’ lives. Recently my constituency work has included campaigning with local parents for better road safety after their child was injured in a car accident.

Serving our country was one of the most rewarding things I have done. I helped provide a stable coalition Government to get our economy back on track after the 2008 financial crisis. One of my proudest achievements was increasing Sheffield’s school budget by providing an extra £62 million to help Sheffield’s children get the best start in life.

endorsements.endorsement: I have known and worked with Nick for over a decade. He has helped thousands of local people with all kinds of issues and problems. We could not ask for a better voice to stand up for us in Parliament.
I’m backing Nick Clegg this time - he works very hard for our area. Whenever something needs sorting, it’s always the Liberal Democrat team who are willing to help.
There is no one better I can think of to be our MP. Nick works incredibly hard and is very committed. Everyone knows someone who Nick has helped. He’s a real community champion.

examples: Recently my constituency work has included campaigning with local parents for better road safety after their child was injured in a car accident.
Serving our country was one of the most rewarding things I have done.
I’m proud of the work I have done locally to make a difference to peoples’ lives.
Working to make sure Sheffield’s NHS gets the support it needs.
